html:
Mama listen
There is distance between us
We’re divided by separation
Under claws of the eagle
Maybe it’s not a lot
In scale of the world
But I have a sister
I have a brother
And when sadness strikes
When you’re about to cry
Listen to the good faerie
She’ll make you happier
And time heals wounds
We had lots of them
But we are strong
We’ll heal up
title: For mama
